---
name: Default Issue Template (Recommended)
about: This is the default template for Issues, following the Overview and In-depth
  Details outline.
title: ''
labels: ''
assignees: ''

---

### Overview
- 1-2 lines on what you want to implement or change.
- Is this a sub-issue to anything else? If so, specify.

### In-depth Details
- More in-depth details here.
- Please be clear and specific about this addition, such as linking related commits, pull requests, and issues.
